Reviews.Title: Save your money Don't buy Lorex
Reviews.Author: milton 316

ProductInfo.Features:
Detail you can depend on. Clarity, sharpness and accurate color during the day, Bright Night viewing and close-up recognition in the dark.
TV/PC/CCTV with industry standard HDMI/VGA/BNC inputs up to 4 monitors simultaneously. HDMI cable included.
Download free Apps for your Smartphone or tablet. Use your PC or Mac for advanced remote monitoring.
A Super+ Resolution Perspective. Detail you can count on Day & Night.
Auto-light compensation sensory prevents wash-out effect enabling facial identification.
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex LH1361001C8B  Eco2 Security Camera System with 8 Super+ Resolution Cameras (Black)
